short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortcut to create a new tab in the active group

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to define a custom shortcut key (i.e. Ctrl+T) to open new tab within the current tab group.  Shortcut can be specified by navigating Chrome's extension shortcut manager located at url chrome://extensions/shortcuts
